name: Time Loop Traffic
description:
Time Loop Madness!

You have 10 seconds to drive every hover car in the city to its destination—at the same time. Drive fast and dodge your past!

How to Play

The controls are straight-forward: push in the direction you want to go.

  • Gamepad:   Left Stick
  • Keyboard:   WASD or Arrow Keys

Follow your little navigation arrow to the marked destination. Then do it again and again, avoiding the traffic chaos your past selves will create. Most importantly though, tell us your score in the comments.

Time Loop Traffic was made in 72 hours
for Ludum Dare 51 (“Every 10 Seconds”)

Support Us

If you enjoy Time Loop Traffic, consider supporting us directly,
